long_description: With its sleek, aerodynamic design, the Thule Pack 'n Pedal Handlebar Bag works great for items such as your camera or food that you want within easy reach while riding. Thule Pack 'n Pedal Handlebar Bag features a dual opening for easy access either while riding or carrying off the bike. Easy click in/out from Thule Pack 'n Pedal Handlebar Mount (sold separately). Weatherproof and breathable main material. Built-in reflective fabric increases visibility when night riding. Shoulder strap and raincover included.
short_description: With its sleek, aerodynamic design, the Thule Pack 'n Pedal Handlebar Bag works great for items such as your camera or food that you want within easy reach while riding.
